reviewText: I bought this because my 3 year old was not interested in numbers. He loves and wants to watch daily.
My boys ADORE Umizoomie and this movie is just as good as the others. My boys ask to watch it every day.

My boys (3 and 5) love Team Umizoomi and honestly they are learning so much from the show that I don't mind them watching it.  They teach patterns, numbers, colors and it is done is such a fun way that they don't realize their learning!  "Umigames" is a DVD that features its main episode being an Olympics of sorts for Team Umizoomi.  It was the perfect episode to get my boys thinking about summer sports!  Next up is three more episodes with more Team Umizoomi fun!  It is an hour and a half and perfect to watch all the way through or an episode here and there.  I don't think we have any other Team Umizoomi DVDs so this is perfect for them since we have lots of downtime this summer!
My nephew is addicted to team umizoomi.
My kids love this.
nice dvd
great video
Purchased this on Amazon video. Love having the ability to watch it anywhere we go. Always has great picture, never fuzzy.

Same as my other comment.  I wish there were more descriptions of the episodes included.  Basically, if you have regular episodes purchased don't buy this, because it contains the same episodes.  Waste of money if you have already purchased all the seasons.
great
Love the math in this video!
My son loves Team UmiZoomi and this DVD is no exception.  Good price for another road trip DVD.
Ok
Both my four year old and two and half year old boys love this show! I love that this show provides patterns, shapes, and many learning exercises!

Shipping was not as fast as I'm used to when buying from Amazon, but still not too bad, about 4-5 days. My grandson absolutely loves this DVD. No more waiting for his favorite show to come on Nickelodeon, he can watch it anytime he wants now.
Cute TV show
My son loves it!
Kids love this show. Has some educational aspects related to math and shapes.
It's Team Umizoomi what can I say, my kiddos love it!

my son loves this

Love team umizoomi just would like for it to be a few dollars less for amount of run time on it.

grandson loved it

My grandchildren love this DVD great value

My son is in love with team umizoomi.  This DVD is great because it plays more than one episode and the run time is at least an hour.  Not that he is allowed to watch more than an hour at a time but during road trips this fits the bill perfectly.
for grandson
My 4 year old grandson enjoys this show. It does a nice job of entertaining and educating at the same time.
Love all Umizoomi videos.  This one got my 2yr old into different sports.  Great for learning and discovering what fun outdoor sports they like.
Great
My 3 year old loves this show and has learned a lot watching it.
My 2.5 year old has watched these same three episodes, three nights in a row. If you have an Umizoomi lover, it's worth the purchase.
like all the umizoomi things.. I don't like 'em but my two year old can now count to twenty sooo......
ALL DAY it's on!!!!!
video very nice

Got this for my son. The kid is obsessed with Team Umizoomi. It's literally all he wants to watch. This is a great dvd because it has some new episodes that aren't available on Amazon Instant video. Team Umizoomi, it's time for action!
Good
One of the best tools to learn how to count higher numbers. Both my kids (ages 2 and 5 ) love looking and interacting with Team Umizoomi. They count along with the them.
Great buy!! My baby loves them and is so happy cuz he got movies lol!
My daughter LOVES THEM !
My son loves team Umizoomi. I got this DVD to use in the car for long trips and it's great.
I love Umizoomi. My son watches it and doesn't even realize he's learning math! Sneaky sneaky. I just wish more DVDs were available.
My 2 year old daughter loves Team Umizoomi. I like it because it engages her mind while also entertaining her.
UmiZoomi has great videos!  Always many things to learn while watching something the kids enjoy so they don't even realize they are learning! my 3 year old loves this!
This was a christmas present for my 3 year old granddaughter so I am sure that she loves it and enjoys it.
Loves it! Its a great length, continuous play and he sits still. I can not ask for more than that!
This is my grandson's absolute favorite program - which I hadn't heard of until it popped up on his Christmas list... he loved this!

this DVD Was Purchased As A Christmas Gift For My 5 Year Old Son. He Loves It and Is Still Carrying It With Him Every Where He Goes. He Loves It. I'm Not Sure How Educational It Is As It Didn't Take Him Long To Figure Out All The Answers To The questions.

My granddaughter is hooked and now watches more of Umizoomi than Mickey.  This is a Christmas present for car trips.

TC
Unfortunately I bought this without knowing the whole thing is episodes from season 3 that we already own. Amazon should make that clear or get rid of it...
As much as my 2 y.o loves Team Umizoomi, for some reason he watches this one less than all of is other DVDs. He hasn't said that he doesn't like it but it's not in heavy rotation.

This show has done a great job teaching my 4 year olds how to think about addition, subtraction and patterns!  We will be sitting at the dinner table and my daughter will say, "Mommy, if I have 5 pieces of apple and I eat 2, how many will I have left?"

Yeah, it's like that.

Our son really enjoys all the Team Umizoomi . The Dvd's shows are a great way to help show you child about colors, shapes and patterns.  Thanks Amazon for the variety of dvd's on Team Umizoomi the great buys and the quality of the dvd's were great.

What is better then some quiet time or productive time while your three year old quietly watches a show? Knowing that they are learning the whole time and are engaged enough to give you twenty solid minutes of uninterrupted quiet. Love it.
Bought this for Grandson's 5th birthday.  He loves Team Umizoomi.  He asked to watch it first thing after party over!

This was very inexpensive, almost 2 hours long, teaches my daughter all kinds of math skills and best of all, SHE LOVES IT!!!  I bought a few other videos, but she won't let me take this one out of the DVD player in the car.
Age appropriate with cute content and songs. An immediate favorite for my son. Good mix of fun and educational in one.

How many times I hve seen these cartoons. I love you for your educational vale and hate you for being so entertaining that he wants to watch you over and over and over. :)
But in truth, this is a great dvd for your kids.
I ordered this video so my grandson could watch it on a small DVD player while we watched something else on TV.  It's perfect!!  We are all together in the same room and everyone is happy.
Anything that can teach my son his numbers and what to do with them AND! make it an enjoyable experience is a good look in my book.  We looooove UmiZoomi!!
Could get house cleaned and he was learning something. Makes mommy's day a little bit easier. Would recommend to anyone with kids his age.

My 3 year old granddaughter sang along and answered  the questions about shapes. She is learning trapezoids!  This cartoon features geometrical shapes, vocabulary of sports, and encourages healthy competition (not giving up even if you start last).
I liked it especially for the subtle cultural exposure to Japanese outlook.
Who's glad we don't have to rewind anymore? I know that I am, I just pop it in the DVD player and she watches it like crazy even if I tell her she needs to watch something else.
my little boy loves umizoomi and this one is definitley a mom favorite as a great learning tool for youngsters!!
This is my grandson''s favorite cartoon.  He will be 4 at the end of this month. He likes all the series.
My 14 month old grandson loves team umizoomi & so do I. We watch it together so I bought episodes to watch on the go.

Kiddo loves her some umizoomi and bought this on prime via roku with a credit. It's a bit sporty, but it's pretty easygoing (some are a bit stressful with OH NOs everywhere!). It's basically three episodes in a row and were easy to put on when traveling. We save it for travel and haven't needed to buy the dvd. She doesn't ask for it like some others.
Worth the few bucks for decent screen time, when needed for my three/four yr old. Awesome counting game. Some games he's working on, some he got right away.

I am always looking for great educational apps that will educate and entertain my children.  As my boys love the show Team Umizoomi, I got the app.  They keep themselves busy playing it while waiting at restaurants and in the car.  It is fun to hear their interaction with the game.
muy son loves it.its not annoying and its educational.  fun fun fun fun fun fun fun fun fun fun fun
my son LOVES team umizoomi...but doesn't like the umigames in the beginning. he would rather have more episodes of team umizoomi to watch.
my grandson went crazy when this came in and watches it all the time. We saw it on tv and my wife immediately got on amazon and ordered it.
It came in quick and works. I really like this series. My 2 Yr old son is really following along and learning from it. Will keep looking out for more.
My two year old grandson is crazy about this video, watches it over and over... 'nough said.  If he likes it, that is good enough for me.

I bought this for my 3 1/2 year old and he watches it over and over.  He loves the UMI Games and cannot get enough of them.  He even imitates the games with his older brother.  Out of all the Team Umizoomi DVD's this is the best or so says my little one.

If you buy the series do not rent or buy this, its a cluster of the shows.  Made the big mistake of buying it just to find out I already purchased the show.....so total waste of money... Amazon did refund my money after my complaint, which was awesome, but my 3 yr old hit purchase after he seen it again!

My daughter is now 4 and watches 30 minutes of TV per day.  She gets to pick what she wants to watch each time and Team Umizoomi is high on her favorites list.

From a parent's perspective, Team Umizoomi provides some basic counting skills and Millie is a good role model for young girls - being on top of things and figuring out what to do next.

Yes, I would recommend this DVD to a friend - and my daughter would also!
My grand daughter loves these little guys.  She has learned a lot and retains almost all of it.  Way better than Yo Gabba Gabba!!
Team Umizoomi is definitely the way to go if you want to help your toddlers learn and keep them engaged.

Wish there were more episodes on the dvd, but my 2 year old LOVES "zoomizoomi" haha! He watches it all the time and it keeps him occupied when I need to wash dishes or mop the floor! Who could ask for anything any better! Love it!
My 2 year old and 3 year old grandsons love this DVD.They particapate in helping solve all the chores. Good price too.

I have three Team Umizoomi dvds and this is the best one of them all!!! My son loves the first episode where they play in the Umigames. He is big on sports and team umizoomi is his favorite show, so having two of the things he loves on one show is great! The other episodes on the dvd are just as good (especially when Bot plays the whack-a-fruit game at the carnival!). This is an awesome dvd and would definitely recommend it to any parent who kid likes team umizoomi.

Team Umizoomi is a big hit at our house because both my 5 year old and 2 year old really enjoy it. The DVD features a new episode called the Umigames, it's a nice Olympics themed episode and one my kids hadn't seen yet. Also included are three older episodes: Boardwalk Games, Carnival, and Crazy Skates (which my 2 year old loves). Team Umizoomi is the only show on Nick Jr which still holds my 5 year olds' attention. I'm not much for justifying my children's tv time by calling it "educational" but there are REAL math skills to be learned on this show, from counting by 10's to pattern recognition. I'm super happy with this DVD.
Grandson loves this show. Good length for money
Umi-Riffic!
If I could give this 0 stars I would. I purchased this and it would never download to my device. What a waste of money!
My grandson loves it

I have bought 2 copies of this. My daughter loves it. She sings the songs and counts along with patterns.

I like how it auto starts when the episodes end. It is on the dvd menu for a min or 2 and starts playing. I can get one kid setup with a movie and make a bottle or change the  other.
